descriptionHtml:
Requires Dawnguard

[youtube]aiv4RHB3gTM[/youtube]

Hey

so i did upload my personal favored follower that i made for myself
with the new update you can transform too

If you download this and you start your game you will get a new quest to find a guard
just follow the marker

The pets have no dialog options everything works like this

if you summon them you get a weapon called Krümel or Löwenzahn

if you drop the weapon (u dont need it to equip) the fox will stop follow you and you can call him again


he will transform when you start battle and goes back into fox form after
added him a elemental fury shout
not sure if he uses
weretiger textures are not final


ok so i uploadet a new Version 
IMPORTANT!!!!!!
the guard should give after ending the quest 4 new lesser powers that let you become a were tiger or were fox
i added an option if you have allready done the quest just talk to him tell me if its not working since i use coc to test my stuff and i dont want to complete the quest 100 of  times
you can enter your menues like normal you cant cast spells, you CAN cast shouts or powers, you can equip stuff weapons dont look good if equipped 
no one will attack you when change to a werefox or tiger exept you attack them or the hostile anyway
these are standalone transformations does not change the vanilla

IMPORTANT!!
If the guard is not talking to you save the game and reload should fix it
author: AluCard
